Not really its the one time we actually can't use our
lives as an excuse for not posting (by the way if I
just call it "The Oracle Computer" can I have a char
discover Vector Sigma.  I would just call it Vector
Sigma if LN would shut his trap about another one in
G1 if he wouldn't be countering his own insults he
would probably blab something about the one in RID).

>
